oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Copy of crayon print of Sgt. Noah Wimberly Thompson, Co. I, 46th Tenn. Inf. Regt., CSA
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Sgt. Noah Wimberly Thompson, Co. I, 46th Tenn. Inf. Regt., CSA, disappeared during the war. His brother William noticed that he was discharged and left for home, but never knew what became of him. Another record says that he died Athens, Ala., but no record was found of it. Related family items: wmca072, wmca073, and wmca075.
